stimulusHtml: According to the sentence, which of the following statements is true?

features.html:
Musonius laetissimus Caelio esse videtur.

Â

choicesHtml: Caelius is very happy to see Musonius.
Musonius is very happy to see Caelius.
Caelius thinks Musonius is very happy.
Musonius thinks Caelius is very happy.
